description: Try our easy to follow Kebab Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Kebab Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pita bread on serving plates. Top with lettuce, tomato and onion. Add a dollop of hummus. Top with a kebab skewer. Roll up to enclose. Serve immediately.
